DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety, tolerability, and MTD (maximum tolerated dose) of TTI-237 for the treatment of subjects with advanced malignant solid tumors.
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating TTI-237 in Advanced Malignant Solid Tumors.
DOC.criteria: Documented diagnosis of malignant solid tumor with measurable disease Life expectancy of at least 12 weeks ECOG (The Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group scale) performance status of 0, 1, or 2 Recent major surgery, radiation therapy or anticancer treatment History of any other prior malignancy within the last 5 years
